column1: Smoque BBQ////We got here on a weeknight a little after 6pm and were prepared to wait in line until we had experienced many emotions ranging from excitement
column9: but we only had to wait a whopping 5 minutes before placing our order. I love that the menu is written on a chalkboard so you can decide what you want while you wait in line. We both got the brisket platter with the BBQ beans
column11: Â and mac n' cheese. Both of our meals came with a side of cole slaw.
